add(int) - Method in class dao.DocumentTermList
Adds the specified termID to the list.
add(int, float) - Method in class dao.DocumentTermList
Adds the specified entry to the list.
add(int) - Method in interface dao.IDocumentTermList
Adds the specified term to the end of the list.
add(int) - Method in interface dao.IPostingsList
Adds the specified docID to the end of the postings list.
add(int) - Method in class dao.PostingsList
Adds a document to the PostingsList.
add(int, int) - Method in class dao.PostingsList
Adds the specified docID to the PostingsList and adds the specified amount to the termFrequency.
add(String, int) - Method in class dao.Vocabulary
Adds the specified term to the vocabulary.
add(char) - Method in class indexing.Stemmer
Add a character to the word being stemmed.
add(char[], int) - Method in class indexing.Stemmer
Adds wLen characters to the word being stemmed contained in a portion of a char[] array.
add(char[], int, int) - Method in class indexing.Stemmer
Same as Stemmer.add(char[], int), but lets the user choose an offset (useful for large char arrays).
add(T) - Method in class retrieval.SizedPriorityQueue
Add a value to the current list of items, it will be inserted into the correct position in the list if it has a higher priority than the other items, otherwise it will be dropped
add(T, double) - Method in class retrieval.SizedPriorityQueue
Add a value to the current list of items, it will be inserted into the correct position in the list if it has a higher priority than the other items, otherwise it will be dropped
addDoc(int) - Method in class dao.DocumentTermMatrix
Creates a new row in the matrix for the given document and returns a DocumentTermList associated with this entry.
addSilent(String) - Method in class dao.Vocabulary
 
addTerm(String) - Method in class dao.Dictionary
 
addTerm(String) - Method in interface dao.IDictionary
Adds the term new_term to the dictionary and returns a new (i.e. empty) postings list for this term.
applyTfThresholds(int, int) - Method in class dao.Dictionary
 
applyTfThresholds(int, int) - Method in class dao.DocumentTermList
Applies termFrequency Thresholding using the provided thresholds.
applyTfThresholds(int, int) - Method in class dao.DocumentTermMatrix
Can only be called *before* calling DocumentTermMatrix.calculateIdfs(Vocabulary).
